list.title: Download latest version of plug-in (version 1.3) Click here to download: optimalship.zip
Open your Wordpress Admin panel, click on Plugins, and select Add New
Click "Upload Plugin" and select the downloaded ZIP.
Find Optimal Ship Express International Shipping in your list of plugins and click Activate (if necessary)
Click "Optimal Ship" in the Shipping panel sub-menu.

content.title: Configuration menu
unorderedList: Export Number: Enter Optimal Ship Export Number. If you do not know your Export Number, please contact customerservice@optimalship.com
Enable: Click the Enable checkbox to begin showing DHL Express with OptimalShip rates in your shopping cart. To remove this shipping service but not uninstall the plugin, uncheck this box.
Enable Dimensional Weights: If your products have dimensions, click Enable Dimensions Weights. This will allow dimensional weights to be used, resulting in much more accurate rates on larger items.
Custom Surcharge: Add a Custom Surcharge as desired. This is a flat rate that will be added to the total charge of the shipment and passed on to the client in their shopping cart.
Title: Adjust title as desired. This is the name that will appear in your client's shopping cart.

list.title: Shipping Zones: Add DHL with OptimalShip to international shipping zones as desired.

Verify everything is working by adding items to your shopping cart and calculating the shipping cost. You should see DHL with OptimalShip (or the name of the service you've provided in Settings) appear as one of the shipping options for international orders.
